description:

Feb  6 17:34:15 mandarin dnsmasq[5165]: child process exited with status 1
title: /usr/bin/nova-dhcpbridge: IndexError: list index out of range (dnsmasq exit with status 1)

comments.content: Could you give a bit more information on the context ? What's your setup like ? When do you get that error ?
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ttx

comments.content: I don't have this problem anymore the last days after cleaning up my test installation. I think there were some stucked data. I'll close this bug now and re-open it if I see the problem again and I know how to reproducte it...
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~berendt
